itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 25, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 25, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, Jeff Tyler, D Gorenstein, Queena Kim, David Brancaccio, Stacey Vanek Smith and Johnny Niemann
teaser: A look at two Mexican border factories that likely provide better benefits than your job. An economy bigger than India's, Russia's, or Canada's might need a bailout this year. What's ahead for Italy in the next six months? And one word: plastics.
description: A look at two Mexican border factories that likely provide better benefits than your job. An economy bigger than India's, Russia's, or Canada's might need a bailout this year. What's ahead for Italy in the next six months? And one word: plastics.
